help.short: List the list of advisor scores.
Get the advisor score.
Manage Advisor Score
Create Azure Advisor assessment resource.
Delete a existing Azure Advisor assessment.
List list of Azure Advisor assessment.
Get a existing Azure Advisor assessment.
Manage Assessment
List list of Azure Advisor assessment types.
Manage Assessment Type
Create Azure Advisor configuration and also delete all configurations of contained resource groups.
List Azure Advisor configurations and also retrieve configurations of contained resource groups.
Manage Configuration

Get the status of the recommendation computation or generation process. Invoke this API after calling the generation recommendation. The URI of this API is returned in the Location field of the response header.
Manage Generate Recommendation Untitled1
List the list of metadata entities.
Get the metadata entity.
Manage Metadatum

Create the snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation. The snoozed or dismissed attribute is referred to as a suppression. Use this API to create or update the snoozed or dismissed status of a recommendation.
Delete the activation of a snoozed or dismissed recommendation. The snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation is referred to as a suppression.
Get the details of a suppression.
Manage Suppression
List cached recommendations for a subscription. The recommendations are generated or computed by invoking generateRecommendations.
Get details of a cached recommendation.
Update the tracked properties of a Recommendation.
Manage Recommendation
List list of Azure Advisor resiliency reviews.
Get existing Azure Advisor resiliency review by id.
Manage Resiliency Review
List the list of snoozed or dismissed suppressions for a subscription. The snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation is referred to as a suppression.
Manage Suppression
Approve a triage recommendation for a given id.
List list of recommendations for an existing Azure Advisor Resiliency Review Id.
Reject an existing triage recommendation for a given id.
Reset an existing triage recommendation for a given id.
Get an existing recommendation by id for an existing Azure Advisor Resiliency Review Id.
Manage Triage Recommendation
List all triage resources that belong to a review and recommendation.
Get a triage resource for a given review and recommendation.
Manage Triage Resource
List list of Workloads.
Manage Workload
Initiates the recommendation generation or computation process for a subscription. This operation is asynchronous. The generated recommendations are stored in a cache in the Advisor service.
Predicts a recommendation.
Manage Advisor
